channel.title: Signatures
channel.description:
I was wondering how i get a signature on my profile? Thank you to anyone who will help me :D[br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2007, 09:42:23 PM[/size][hr]Please help me :D, Good night all!
Signing off for the night :rolleyes:

item.title: Signatures
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

Profile ==> Forum Profile Information ==> Signature:
Signatures are displayed at the bottom of each post or personal message. BBC code and smileys may be used in your signature.

~Svenimen S

Read full topic
